name: .BLG File Extension
summary: Learn about .BLG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A BLG file is a log file created by Windows performance tracking tools. It is used to analyze server and computer loads and discover resource bottlenecks. BLG files contain a history of the computer resource utilization and performance, such as the amount of CPU, memory, and disk resources used by different programs.

content: BLG files are stored in a proprietary binary format. They can be converted to .CSV files using the "relog" command at the command prompt in Windows. They also can be viewed in the Windows Administrative Tools.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
